languages.text: "Тем более что..." {n}Космодесантник Хаоса осклабляется и хохочет.{/n} "Тем более что душа твоего цепного колдуна уже отмечена моим владыкой".
"Especially since..." {n}He bares his teeth and chuckles.{/n} "Especially since the soul of your leashed sorcerer has already been marked by my lord."
languages.original_text: "Тем более что..." {n}Космодесантник Хаоса осклабляется и хохочет.{/n} "Тем более что душа твоего цепного колдуна уже отмечена моим владыкой".

traits.locale_text: "Especially since..." {n}He bares his teeth and cackles.{/n} "Especially since the soul of your leashed sorcerer has already been marked by my lord."

"Especially since..." {n}He bares his teeth and chuckles.{/n} "Especially since the soul of your leashed sorcerer has already been marked by my lord."

languages.text: «Especialmente si...». {n}Te enseña los dientes y se ríe.{/n} «Especialmente si tenemos en cuenta que el alma de tu mascota hechicera ya está marcada por mi señor».
languages.original_text: "Especially since..." {n}He bares his teeth and chuckles.{/n} "Especially since the soul of your leashed sorcerer has already been marked by my lord."

traits.locale_text: «Especialmente si...». {n}Te enseña los dientes y se carcajea.{/n} «Especialmente si tenemos en cuenta que el alma de tu mascota hechicera ya está marcada por mi señor».

languages.text: 「特に…」{n}彼は歯をむき出しにして笑った。{/n}「特に、お前の鎖で繋がれたソーサラーの魂は、すでに我が主によって印が刻まれているのだから」
languages.original_text: "Especially since..." {n}He bares his teeth and chuckles.{/n} "Especially since the soul of your leashed sorcerer has already been marked by my lord."

traits.locale_text: 「特に…」{n}彼は歯をむき出しにして笑った。{/n}「特に、お前の鎖で繋がれたソーサラーの魂は、すでに我が主によって印が刻まれているのだから」

languages.text: “更何况……”{n}他露出牙齿，笑了起来。{/n}“更何况，那个拴在你手上的巫师，他的灵魂早就被我的主人烙上了印记。”
languages.original_text: "Especially since..." {n}He bares his teeth and chuckles.{/n} "Especially since the soul of your leashed sorcerer has already been marked by my lord."

traits.locale_text: “更何况……”{n}他露出牙齿，大笑起来。{/n}“更何况，那个拴在你手上的巫师，他的灵魂早就被我的主人烙上了印记。”

languages.text: « D'autant plus... » {n}Il esquisse un rictus et ricane.{/n} « D'autant plus que mon seigneur a déjà posé sa marque sur l'âme de votre sorcier de compagnie. »
languages.original_text: "Especially since..." {n}He bares his teeth and chuckles.{/n} "Especially since the soul of your leashed sorcerer has already been marked by my lord."

traits.locale_text: « D'autant plus... » {n}Il esquisse un rictus et ricane.{/n} « D'autant plus que mon seigneur a déjà posé sa marque sur l'âme de votre sorcier de compagnie. »

languages.text: "Zumal ..." {n}Er fletscht die Zähne und lacht.{/n} "Zumal die Seele Eures angeleinten Zauberers bereits von meinem Herrn markiert wurde."
languages.original_text: "Especially since..." {n}He bares his teeth and chuckles.{/n} "Especially since the soul of your leashed sorcerer has already been marked by my lord."

traits.locale_text: "Zumal ..."{n}, er fletscht die Zähne und lacht,{/n} "zumal die Seele Eures angeleinten Zauberers bereits von meinem Herrn markiert wurde."

languages.text: "Kaldı ki..." {n}Dişlerini gösterip gülüyor.{/n} "Kaldı ki efendim, tasmalı sahirinin ruhunu işaretlemişti."
languages.original_text: "Especially since..." {n}He bares his teeth and chuckles.{/n} "Especially since the soul of your leashed sorcerer has already been marked by my lord."

traits.locale_text: “Zaten...” {n}Dişlerini gösterip gülüyor.{/n} “Zaten tasmalı sahirinin ruhunu efendim işaretlemişti.”
